name: Mud Golem
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mud golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Mud Ball
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The mud golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
